statements.query: MATCH (n:LaunchTemplateVersion)<-[:VERSION]-(:LaunchTemplate)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:LaunchTemplate)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
